title: Democracy Now! 2022-10-28 Friday
description:
Carol Anderson on Democrats losing ground in the closely watched Senate and gubernatorial races in Georgia; Mother Jones reporter Ari Berman on how Republicans used extreme gerrymandering to take over the Wisconsin legislature and what this means for 2024; Voting rights activist Desmond Meade on how Republicans in Florida are trying to intimidate formerly incarcerated people from voting.
